text: North Babylon is a hamlet and census-designated place (CDP) located in Suffolk County, on the south shore of Long Island, in New York, United States. The population was 17,927 at the 2020 census. It is a suburban middle class community located within the Town of Babylon. ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: North Babylon, New York
